name: Children Dash 1
overview: Children Dash 1 (also known as Children 1) is a 1988 Boulder Dash game made by Boulderwilli using Peter Liepa's Boulder Dash Construction Set. It was called Children Dash 1 because Boulderwilli aimed to gear the game toward a younger audience. It was released as a "Christmas" release, so sometime around late November to late December of 1988.
